txt.en: You have defeated many Trolls in Pelennor Fields.
Trolls can be found throughout Pelennor Fields.\n\nYou should defeat Trolls in Pelennor Fields.

'Trolls lumber across the fields to the east. I fear I am no match for these beasts. I've fought my fair share of Orcs but have yet to encounter a Troll on my own.

'You are not inexperienced like I am. You have fought many beasts and have lived to tell the tale. I am sure you would be able to take on many of the Trolls that lurk in the Pelennor.

'Their numbers must dwindle if Minas Tirith is to win this battle.'
Turgon, watcher of the South-gate of the Rammas, is concerned with the growing number of Trolls pushing ever closer to the great city of Minas Tirith.
